topic.title: Port Clocking

body.p: Switchtec provides a wide variety of clocking options allowing for maximum flexibility with designs using the switch. Multiple input clocks can be defined for the switch allowing for ports to use a variety of input reference clocks with or without SSC providing a way to mix common SSC, non common SSC and SRIS/SRNS. The switch also features multiple output reference clocks which can be used to feed to downstream devices in a common clocking environment. The output clocks can enable or disable SSC independently.
The following section will cover the clocking architecture of Switchtec as well as provide instructions on configuring the clocking settings.
Switchtec has one required clock: PCIE_REFCLK_D. All other clocks are optional and dependent on use-case.
